title: "Mindful Exercises for Concentration and Relaxation"
first_phrase: In the previous section, the text discussed three exercises to increase self-awareness and concentration. In this section, we will learn about three additional exercises to improve mental focus. The text mentions Levarsi - sedersi, which involves voluntarily standing up and sitting down while being aware of the intention behind the action. The next exercise is to perform a simple action with complete concentration, and the third is to practice rhythmic breathing, which can not only improve physical fitness but also have a positive impact on the mind. The correct way to do the exercise of integral breathing is also explained.

last_phrase: Practicing the integral breathing exercise as described can not only benefit you physically but also have positive effects on your mind. Remember to maintain the correct posture, exhale completely before inhaling, and breathe rhythmically, focusing only on the exercise. By incorporating this exercise into your routine, you can improve both your physical and mental wellbeing.
